content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <feed xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"> <title>Georgia Tech Alumni Association</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/1853/9538" rel="alternate"/> <subtitle>The Georgia Tech Alumni Association offers programs, online services, events, career services and resources to alumni of the Georgia Institute of Technology.</subtitle> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/1853/9538</id> <updated>2015-03-06T08:30:53Z</updated> <dc:date>2015-03-06T08:30:53Z</dc:date> <entry> <title>Characteristics of Great Leaders</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/1853/53157" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>McDonald, Jay</name> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/1853/53157</id> <updated>2015-01-30T15:59:25Z</updated> <published>2015-01-20T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">Characteristics of Great Leaders McDonald, Jay "Great leaders are unforgettable. They're great because they're effective at what they do. However, like anything else, leadership skills come from time and experience, but also, constant learning." \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Jay McDonald. Jay is a leadership expert who will help you understand the characteristics of great leaders and give you advice on how to become one. He will cover the leadership qualities and core values that help get individuals to the top of their chosen field, industry, or community. Presented on January 20, 2015 at 7:00 pm in the LeCraw Auditorium, Scheller College of Business on the Georgia Tech campus.; Jay McDonald is an over 30-year CEO and one of Atlanta's premier executive coaches, mentors and business advisors. He has mentored hundreds of CEOs, business owners, and presidents as they work towards meeting difficult challenges and setting courses for the future.; Runtime: 89:02 minutes </summary> <dc:date>2015-01-20T00:00:00Z</dc:date> <dc:creator>McDonald, Jay</dc:creator> <dc:description>"Great leaders are unforgettable. They're great because they're effective at what they do. However, like anything else, leadership skills come from time and experience, but also, constant learning." \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Jay McDonald. Jay is a leadership expert who will help you understand the characteristics of great leaders and give you advice on how to become one. He will cover the leadership qualities and core values that help get individuals to the top of their chosen field, industry, or community.</dc:description> </entry> <entry> <title>Georgia Tech Alumni Magazine [Volume 90, No. 2] 2014</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/1853/52714" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name/> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/1853/52714</id> <updated>2014-10-28T07:31:44Z</updated> <published>2014-01-01T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">Georgia Tech Alumni Magazine [Volume 90, No. 2] 2014 </summary> <dc:date>2014-01-01T00:00:00Z</dc:date> </entry> <entry> <title>Georgia Tech Alumni Magazine [Volume 90, No. 3] 2014</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/1853/52713" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name/> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/1853/52713</id> <updated>2014-10-28T07:31:43Z</updated> <published>2014-01-01T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">Georgia Tech Alumni Magazine [Volume 90, No. 3] 2014 </summary> <dc:date>2014-01-01T00:00:00Z</dc:date> </entry> <entry> <title>Georgia Tech Alumni Magazine [Volume 90, No. 1] 2014</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/1853/52712" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name/> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/1853/52712</id> <updated>2014-10-28T07:31:41Z</updated> <published>2014-01-01T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">Georgia Tech Alumni Magazine [Volume 90, No. 1] 2014 </summary> <dc:date>2014-01-01T00:00:00Z</dc:date> </entry> </feed>
